# Banquet Hall
## Overview
**Banquet Hall:** This vast dining hall and kitchen complex feeds one hundred fifty people in a pleasant, richly appointed atmosphere.

*Components:* [[Dining Hall, Fancy|Fancy dining hall]] (5), [[Kitchen, Fancy|fancy kitchen]] (5), [[Servants' Quarters|servantsâ€™ quarters]] (3); *Size:* 18 stronghold spaces; *Cost:* 136,200 gp.

*Staff:* Cooks (10), servants (5); *Upkeep:* 75 gp per month.
